Continuación del primer Portal, este juego tal vez no es tan bueno como su predecesor pero eso no quiere decir que no sea un muy buen juego. Aparecen más y nuevas mecánicas que el primero pero no están tan profundizadas como el mismo, gráficamente se ve muy bien y mejora como debe ser, los puzzles están muy bien hechos y se van compejizando a medida que avanza el juego combinando todas las mecánicas nuevas, las cuales no son pocas.
En conclusión, es una digna secuela, no es tan bueno como el primero pero es más completo y complejo que este, asique lo recomiendo completamente.

Gerçekten kendi içinde bir zeka oyunu bunun yanı sıra çok zevkli olması,hikayesi,türkçe altyazılar,net ve düzgün seslendirmeler,akıcılık,müzikler gibi alanlarda oyun çok iyi herkesin oynamasını şiddetle tavsiye ederim PORTAL 2 CANDIR <3

WOW ce jeu est simplement une merveille. Malgrès son âge, il m'a surpris par ses graphismes très franchement propres pour "l'époque". Ce jeu m'a fait ressentir ce que le personneage principal est censé ressentir lors de son aventure "frustrations, joies, colère" et je trouve ça encore plus immersif. Maintenant que j'ai fini le jeu en environ 15 heures en solo, je sens comme une partie de moi qui est resté dans ce personnage dont l'aventure en surprendra encore.
Si vous cherchez un mode coop drôle, amusant mais qui vous oblige à réfléchir ENSEMBLE ce jeu est fait pour vous !

Лучшая игра-головоломка за всё время в игровой индустрии.

Здесь прекрасно всё: от сюжета и геймплея, до дизайна и саундтрека. По моей версии, лучшая игра от Valve. После прохождения одиночной и совместной игры, можно скачивать дополнительные уровни от игроков из мастерской или создавать тестовые камеры самим. Если бы игры-головоломки были бы более популярными среди геймеров, то Portal 2 стала бы игрой 2011 года.

Glodos Still Alive 

Öncelikle birinci oyunu oynamadıysanız hiç buna başlamayın iki oyunda Türkçe altyazı destekliyor bu muhteşem hikayeyi kaçırmanızı kimse istemez .

Oyuna birinci oyundan çok sonra bir tarihte başlıyoruz apature science başında kimse olmayınca harabeye dönmüş bizide biri dinlenme odalarının birine bırakmış . Buradan ileride başımıza gerçekten dert olacak bir robotla başlıyor ve ilk belamızı alıyoruz glodos uyanıyor . Hala yaşayan insanlar için teste devam !

+Oyunun grafikleri yeterli
+Çevre ayrıntısı çok geniş bütün tesis modellenmiş gibi çok fazla ayrıntıyla karşılaşıyoruz
+Hikayesi muhteşem 
+Gerçekten çok fazla ayrıntı var
+çok fazla ayrıntılara diikkat etmeden tesise iyice bakmadan bitirmeyin

If you like puzzle games, this game is an awesome first person experience.  I played it when it came out on xbox, and I saw it on here and had to pick it up.  It's a great game, I wish they had more to come.  Play's great off of steam, I do recommend this game if you like puzzles, it's not an action game so don't expect a call of duty experience, this is definetly a one of a kind game.  Even those it has been years since I played it, I picked it back up and got right into it, it's simple, fun, and can be played for short periods or long periods at a time.  And a huge plus is that I was able to use my xbox controller for this game.
Great game, gotta play it if you want to to puzzle a bit.

断断续续10h+才通关，可能真的是手残+脑子不好使了，但依然不妨碍我吹爆这款游戏，夏促1折入，迄今为止它仍是我最爱的游戏。

Portal 2 is Portal but double. 

You play as Chell, a lady with a funny name. After killing GlaDOS at the end of Portal 1, Chell is brought back into the lab by a mysterious entity and is put into stasis for a long period of time.
About the length of one Peter Jackson movie. 

But some time later, Chell is awoken by a personality core named Wheatley, who is basically a robot designed to be annoying. 
Even voiced by Stephen Merchant. What are the chances? 
Wheatley wants to help Chell escape, and after going through the overgrown and dilapidated facility, they run into an old friend.

Portal 2 is all-around an upgrade over Portal 1. While Portal 1 could be beaten in 45 minutes to an hour, Portal 2 can be beaten in around 57 minutes and 15 seconds. I mean, if you're a super fast guy. It took me six hours, so don't worry.
Wormholes 2 made quite the stir when it was released in 2011, quickly becoming a fan favorite, I cant say cult classic because it sold, like, a billion million copies. 
That's enough money to buy a PlayStation 3 and one game! 

Not to mention the amount of effort put into the sequel, not saying that Portal 1 was a slouch. Everything from the physics, to the story, to the graphics is a general upgrade. There are some quality of life changes like showing you where your portals are at all times. The lighting and textures have improved, and there are less noticeable source-engine things lying around like stock sounds and other Half Life 2 effects. 
Wheatley is also really emotive, considering he's just a big ball with a blue eye. The way he moves and reacts makes him come off more like a Dreamworks or Pixar character rather than something you would see in Portal. 

Considering all the hardcore memeing and tom foolery that happened when the game came out, I actually forgot that this game is actually...You know...Funny? Considering everything in between the jokes and events people actually hooked on to, I was surprised at how many times I actually ended up laughing by the end of it. Which is more than you can say for most games.
Or kids falling over. 

There is nothing funnier than kids falling over. 

One of my favorite things about Portal 2 is just how much time you spend away from the test chambers. I would say that more than half of the game is spent mousing around the inner workings of Aperture Science. Its nice to be able to use the portal gun outside of a controlled environment and getting to explore the machinations of a long dead facility, uncovering it's secrets and even it's history. 
Not to mention more secrets to find, such as a portrait of an important character or the mysterious, and kind of unsettling, lairs of a unseen character who people call the “Ratman”. 

The game is good in its own as a single player game. But much like that alarming growth that is spreading across my leg, Portal 2 is the game that keeps on giving!
 
Outside of the single player campaign there is also a Cooperative mode that has it's own independent campaign featuring Atlas and P-Body, two robots built to replace life test subjects so that testing can continue on forever. 
The Coop mode is different from the main campaign because. Well, there's two of you, and also you have to work together. A majority of the time someone has to either man a device or shoot portals for his buddy to use instead of just doing it by themselves. Communication is key and you can see it as a trust building exercise.
None of that I-fall-you-catch-me crap. I don't even trust another me to catch me. 

Other than the campaign and the coop, there is also a metric assload of community maps that you can just get from the Steam workshop. You can basically play this game forever. Or until you get bored, I guess.

Or you run out of maps, you psycho. 

Portal 2 is good, pretty good actually. I hadn't played the game since its initial release in 2011, so I went into the game with a mostly clear expectation. Portal 2 is fun, has enough extra content to keep you going, and doesn't wear out it's welcome like other games are prone to do. 

I give Portal 2 a big thumbs up and also this chip I found in my suit pocket.

I lied, I'm eating the chip.

玩了辣么久才写评测（玩的忘了），传送门系列算是我玩过最棒的解密游戏了，它有着完整的故事情节，有的需要玩家在游戏内慢慢探索。这个充满高科技的世界给了我无限的趣味，甚至有些关卡差点烧掉我的脑袋。故事结尾却有淡淡的伤感。游戏中的两个大boss也反映出了社会部分人。总之这款游戏你非常值得入手并且去享受它带给你的欢乐。当然你在通关以后也可以选择去创意工坊下载其他玩家所制作的烧脑地图，或者自己制作去烧别人的脑。如果自己玩的无聊了，可以找好基友联机一起搞事，甚至挖坑让好友跳，当然也别太过分了（曾经用陷阱夹死了好友）。我不建议随机队友（要随机队友记得将自己ID改为英文，否者会卡掉），因为往往过了新手教程大部分就不玩了。So，就这么多吧，祝你游戏愉快！

I did not like this anywhere as much as the first game which I thought although short was a masterpiece. Unfortunately I felt this one went on far too long and really dragged in parts. I just wanted it to end by the time I got to the part with the bouncy ink puzzles. 

If they cut it down and made it more concise it could have been great. As it stands I give it a 6/10. Still worth playing.
Portal 2's greatest achievement is somehow being better than the masterpiece that was the original.

I had this game for my PlayStation 3 when I was younger. Then I decided to buy it for my computer during the winter sales. And I want to write a review for this masterpiece. Portal 2 is a video game where you use a portal gun to escape a room that you are trapped into it. It sounds very easy but there are a lot of things that make this game hard. I've played the campaign which is average. But I had the most fun playing Co-op with a friend. The game feels very nice and it is definetly very fun if you use your brain and don't watch videos to go through a level instantly. I recommend it.

神作，仅仅是几个角色，就能带来这么精彩的故事，仅仅是两道传送门就能带来如此有趣的游戏体验（我才不会说我经常卡关）
游戏的音乐更是厉害，不仅仅是画龙点睛，更将玩家的情绪带起，与剧情契合无比.
结尾那段真的是惊喜连连，我的表情从吃惊→开心→qnmdGLaDOS（看到小炮台）→黑人问号（音乐响起）→结束了的虚脱脸部（看到麦田）→露出傻子的笑容（方块从门中飞出）
9.9/10(带小数更装逼哦）（滑稽）

超级超级喜欢Portal2，神作好玩快去玩！
在玩Portal1的时候，我总是感到一种很压抑的气氛，到了有炮塔的那几关我甚至不敢继续！然而在这个第二部，也许是因为一直有个陪你讲话的伙伴，感觉欢脱了不少。在最后实在是忍不住泪流满面，真的好喜欢glados，glados真的超可爱的qwq
剧情推进除了保存加载的界面多了点，还是非常流畅的，没有什么bug。虽然降低了自由度，但很连贯，一气呵成。在解谜方面，很多谜题设置的都很巧妙，但是需要人静下心来思考，唯一可能造成卡关的就是忽略了某些东西，或者是没看到。总的来说很有趣！
再说一遍，我爱GLaDOS！
不说别的，就冲最后一关的脑洞都足以看出传送门2的水平之高了。

Portal 2 is a masterpiece. Portal itself was a great game and to surpass it would have been a challenge but Portal 2 managed to surpass it with brilliant new ideas and challenges it gave to us. If Portal 3 is coming up next, I cannot imaigne the difficulty of them surpassing it concerning the hype Portal 2 has gotten. However, I hope they do so and they have my fullest support to do it as well. Great job!!
